episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg emphasizes the critical role of video in real estate, offering strategies for agents to overcome camera shyness and effectively use video content to generate leads. She introduces her Video Boot Camp program, designed to help agents build confidence and create impactful videos that convert content into cash.
